r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with Redis
r.d: This extension provides an API for communicating with Redis servers.
r.n:
phpredis 5.1.1
This release contains only bugfix for unix-socket connection.
* Fix fail to connect to redis through unix socket [2bae8010, 9f4ededa] (Pavlo Yatsukhnenko, Michael Grunder) * Documentation improvements (@fitztrev)
